example.text: After losing another 8 Americans to gun violence in Texas, we're not even halfway through 2023 and we're on pace to break the record for *most mass shootings in one year. * It's disturbing. We can stop these senseless killings. Will Republicans join us? [[url]]

Illinois has seen at least 272 HazMat incidents involving trains in just the last 10 years. What happened in East Palestine could just as easily have happened in our state, so I was proud to support [[user]]'s bipartisan bill and hope the full Senate passes it swiftly. [[url]]

Every leader in Washington, even [[user]], agrees that we can’t default on our nation’s obligations—except [[user]]. He and his extreme caucus are still pushing for a default that will cause a recession and could cost working families their life savings. Shameful. [[url]]

After losing another 8 Americans to gun violence in Texas, we're not even halfway through 2023 and we're on pace to break the record for *most mass shootings in one year. * It's disturbing. We can stop these senseless killings. Will Republicans join us? [[url]]

In 2023, with more and more geopolitical threats rising by the day, the strength of our bond is as important as ever. Our alliance provides some sense of stability amidst that chaos and some sense of security amidst the unpredictability.
